DialogMessage_AccountLimitMessage:
U hebt de limiet voor het aanmaken van accounts bereikt.
Wilt u de 'Onbeperkt aantal accounts' add-on kopen om door te gaan?
DialogMessage_CleanupFolderMessage: Wilt u alle e-mails in deze map permanent verwijderen?
DialogMessage_CreateLinkedAccountMessage: Geef deze koppeling een naam. Accounts worden samengevoegd onder deze naam.
DialogMessage_DeleteAccountConfirmationT: Alle gegevens die gekoppeld zijn aan dit account worden permanent verwijderd.
DialogMessage_DiscardDraftConfirmationMe: Dit concept zal worden verwijderd. Wilt u doorgaan?
DialogMessage_HardDeleteConfirmationTitl: Bericht(en) zullen permanent verwijderd worden. Wilt u doorgaan?

DialogMessage_RenameLinkedAccountsMessag: Voer een nieuwe naam in voor gekoppeld account
DialogMessage_UnlinkAccountsConfirmation: Deze handeling zal je accounts niet verwijderen, maar alleen de koppeling van gedeelde mappen verbreken. Wil je doorgaan?
DialogMessage_EmptySubjectConfirmationMe: Het bericht heeft geen onderwerp. Wilt u doorgaan?
DialogMessage_RenameFolderMessage: Enter new name for this folder
DialogMessage_UnsubscribeConfirmationOne: Do you want to stop getting messages from {0}?
DialogMessage_UnsubscribeConfirmationGoT: To stop getting messages from {0}, go to their website to unsubscribe.
DialogMessage_UnsubscribeConfirmationMai: Do you want to stop getting messages from {0}? Wino will unsubscribe for you by sending an email from your email account to {1}.
DiscordChannelDisclaimerMessage:
Wino heeft geen eigen Discord server, maar het speciale 'wino-mail' kanaal is gehost op de 'Developer Sanctuary' server.
Om updates over Wino te krijgen, sluit je je aan bij de Developer Sanctuary server en volg je 'wino-mail' kanaal onder 'Community Projects'

Je wordt doorgestuurd naar de server-URL omdat Discord geen kanaaluitnodigingen ondersteunt.

Je moet ten minste 2 accounts hebben om een koppeling te maken.
De koppeling zal verwijderd worden bij het opslaan.

NoMessageCrieteria: No messages match your search criteria
ProtocolLogAvailable_Message: Protocol logs are available for diagnostics.
SettingsAboutGithub_Description: Ga naar de Issue Tracker in de GitHub-repository.
SettingsAccountManagementAppendMessage_D: Maak een kopie van het bericht in de map Verzonden nadat het concept is verzonden. Schakel dit in als u uw e-mails niet ziet nadat u ze hebt verzonden in de map 'Verzonden'.
SettingsEditLinkedInbox_Description: Accounts toevoegen, verwijderen, hernoemen of koppeling bewerken.
SettingsAccountName_Description: Verander de naam van het account.
SettingsAvailableThemes_Description: Selecteer een thema uit Wino’s collectie of pas uw eigen thema's toe.
SettingsAutoSelectNextItem_Description: Select the next item after you delete or move a mail.
SettingsCustomTheme_Description: Maak uw eigen aangepaste thema met aangepaste achtergrond en accentkleur.
SettingsConfigureSpecialFolders_Descript: Set folders with special functions. Folders such as Archive, Inbox, and Drafts are essential for Wino to function properly.
SettingsDeleteAccount_Description: Verwijder alle e-mails en referenties die aan dit account zijn gekoppeld.
SettingsDeleteProtection_Description: Moet Wino u om bevestiging vragen elke keer dat u een e-mail met Shift + Del verwijderd?
SettingsDiscord_Description: Krijg regelmatige ontwikkelingsupdates, neem deel aan roadmap discussies en geef feedback.
SettingsElementThemeSelectionDisabled: Element themaselectie is uitgeschakeld wanneer een niet-standaard thema is geselecteerd.
SettingsEnableIMAPLogs_Description: Schakel dit in om gegevens over IMAP-connectiviteit te verstrekken die je had tijdens de IMAP-server installatie.
SettingsEnableLogs_Description: Mogelijk heb ik de logs nodig om de door jou geopende problemen op GitHub te kunnen analyseren. Geen van de logs zal uw inloggegevens of gevoelige informatie bevatten.
SettingsExpandOnStartup_Description: Set whether Wino should expand this account's folders on startup.
SettingsExternalContent_Description: Manage external content settings when rendering mails.
SettingsFocusedInbox_Description: Set whether Inbox should be split into two as Focused - Other.
SettingsFolderSync_Description: Enable or disable specific folders for synchronization.
SettingsFolderOptions_Description: Change individual folder settings like enable/disable sync or show/hide unread badge.
SettingsHoverActions_Description: Select 3 actions to show up when you hover over the mails with cursor.
SettingsLanguageTime_Description: Wino display language, preferred time format.
SettingsLinkAccounts_Description: Merge multiple accounts into one. See mails from one Inbox together.
SettingsLinkedAccountsSave_Description: Modify the current link with the new accounts.
SettingsMailSpacing_Description: Adjust the spacing for listing mails.
SettingsFolderMenuStyle_Description: Change whether account folders should be nested inside an account menu item or not. Toggle this off if you like the old menu system in Windows Mail
SettingsManageAccountSettings_Descriptio: Notifications, signatures, synchronization and other settings per account.
SettingsAppPreferences_Description: General settings / preferences for Wino Mail.
SettingsAppPreferences_CloseBehavior_Des: What should happen when you close the app?
SettingsAppPreferences_StartupBehavior_D: Allow Wino Mail to launch minimized when Windows starts. Always allow it to receive notifications.
SettingsAppPreferences_StartupBehavior_E: Wino Mail successfully set to be launched in the background on Windows startup.
SettingsAppPreferences_StartupBehavior_D: Wino Mail will not be launched on Windows startup. This will cause you to miss notifications when you restart your computer.
Your administrator or group policies disabled running applications on startup. Thus, Wino Mail can't be set to launch on Windows startup.
Please go to Task Manager -> Startup tab to allow Wino Mail to launch on Windows startup.
SettingsAppPreferences_StartupBehavior_F: Fatal error occurred while changing the startup mode for Wino Mail.
SettingsReorderAccounts_Description: Change the order of accounts in the account list.
SettingsManageLink_Description: Move items to add new link or remove existing link.
SettingsMarkAsRead_Description: Change what should happen to the selected item.
SettingsMarkAsRead_DontChange: Don't automatically mark item as read
SettingsMarkAsRead_Timer: When viewed in the reading pane
SettingsMessageList_Description: Change how your messages should be organized in mail list.
SettingsNoAccountSetupMessage: You didn't setup any accounts yet.
SettingsNotifications_Description: Turn on or off notifications for this account.
SettingsPaneLength_Description: Change the width of the mail list.
SettingsPaypal_Description: Show much more love ❤️ All donations are appreciated.
SettingsPersonalization_Description: Change appearance of Wino as you like.
SettingsReaderFontFamily_Description: Change the default font family and font size for reading mails.
SettingsComposerFontFamily_Description: Change the default font family and font size for composing mails.
SettingsRenameMergeAccount_Description: Change the display name of the linked accounts.
SettingsSemanticZoom_Description: This will allow you to click on the headers in messages list and go to specific date
SettingsPrefer24HourClock_Description: Mail recieve times will be displayed in 24 hour format instead of 12 (AM/PM)
SettingsStartupItem_Description: Primary account item to load Inbox at startup.
SettingsUnlinkAccounts_Description: Remove the link between accounts. This will not delete your accounts.
StoreRatingDialog_MessageFirstLine: All feedbacks are appreciated and they will make much Wino better in the future. Would you like to rate Wino in Microsoft Store?
StoreRatingDialog_MessageSecondLine: Would you like to rate Wino Mail in Microsoft Store?
SystemFolderConfigDialog_ArchiveFolderDe: Archived messages will be moved to here.
SystemFolderConfigDialog_DeletedFolderDe: Deleted messages will be moved to here.
SystemFolderConfigDialog_DraftFolderDesc: New mails/replies will be crafted in here.
SystemFolderConfigDialog_JunkFolderDescr: All spam/junk mails will be here.
SystemFolderConfigDialog_MessageFirstLin: This IMAP server doesn't support SPECIAL-USE extension hence Wino couldn't setup the system folders properly.
SystemFolderConfigDialog_MessageSecondLi: Please select the appropriate folders for specific functionalities.
SystemFolderConfigDialog_SentFolderDescr: Folder that sent messages will be stored.
SystemFolderConfigDialogValidation_Inbox: You can't assign Inbox folder to any other system folder.
SystemFolderConfigDialogValidation_Dupli: Some of the system folders are used more than once in the configuration.
WinoUpgradeDescription: Wino offers 3 accounts to start with for free. If you need more than 3 accounts, please upgrade
SignatureDeleteDialog_Message: Are you sure you want to delete "{0}" signature?
SettingsAppPreferences_ServerBackgroundi: Wino Mail will keep running on the system tray. Available to launch by clicking on an icon. You will be notified as new mails arrive.
Wino Mail will keep running in the background. You will be notified as new mails arrive.
Wino Mail will not keep running anywhere. You will not be notified as new mails arrive. Launch Wino Mail again to continue mail synchronization.
TitleBarServerDisconnectedButton_Descrip: Wino is disconnected from the network. Click reconnect to restore connection.
